---
Help: Contains API script for Adding Transporter
Test
---
!| Script    |Http                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|setBaseUrl; |${turl}/api/login                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|getResponse;|Application/Json|put             |{"data":{"email":"${transporter_username}","password":"${transporter_password}"}}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|$token=     |getHeader;      |x-auth-token                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|addHeader;  |Authorization   |bearer $token                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|setBaseUrl; |${turl}/api/transporter/trip                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|$response=  |getResponse;    |Application/Json|post|{"data":{"referenceCity":"${reference_city}","customer_reference":"${reference_id}","source":"${source_location}","destination":"${destination_location}","source_pincode":"${s_pincode}","destination_pincode":"${d_pincode}","truck_number":"${truck_num}","driver_number":"${driver_number}","ping_frequency_minutes": "${ping_interval}","auto_complete_by":"${autocomplete_by}","isJio":"${is_jio}"}}|
|$status=    |getStatusCode;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

!| Script |json                                    |
|$trip_id=|getValueFromJSON;|$response|data.trip_id|
